title: Error "Failed to resolve Quarkus application model for quarkusAppPartsBuild" during Gradle build when a QuarkusTask is eagerly configured
body:
### Describe the bug

This is a weird one. I'm OK with this one getting closed as "won't fix" but I wanted to write this up as this was a good lesson learned for me about some Gradle best practices, and you may learn something as well, if not also want to fix this.

I ran into this issue because I was writing a check to ensure the JDK used to run Gradle matched the JDK used to build, and fail the build if it didn't, [to avoid late failures from another Quarkus issue](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/20452). For the purposes of this bug, you can reproduce it by simply doing:
```gradle
tasks.withType(io.quarkus.gradle.tasks.QuarkusTask.class) {
  doFirst {
    println "Hello world!"
  }
}
```

The reason this fails is quite complicated, but it all starts with the fact that [this particular withType API](https://docs.gradle.org/8.1.1/javadoc/org/gradle/api/DomainObjectCollection.html#withType-java.lang.Class-groovy.lang.Closure-) that I used is "eager". You wouldn't know this because [even when you dig the Javadoc is not clear](https://docs.gradle.org/8.1.1/javadoc/org/gradle/api/DomainObjectCollection.html#all-org.gradle.api.Action-). It wasn't until I peeked at the Gradle source that I realized that the [code is explicit even though the Javadoc isn't](https://github.com/gradle/gradle/blob/v8.1.1/subprojects/core/src/main/java/org/gradle/api/internal/DefaultDomainObjectCollection.java#L142).

What this means is that the QuarkusTask object is initialized very early in the creation of the project, and in particular the QuarkusBuildTask [reads project metadata in the constructor](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/3.1.2.Final/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusBuildTask.java#L46) which at first glance appears very safe. However, at this point in initialization, the group property hasn't yet been set, so the group defaults to the directory name. Later, Quarkus [does a sanity check which fails](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/3.1.2.Final/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/AppModelGradleResolver.java#L170) because the stored group no longer matches the actual real group that the artifact is being produced with.

I am unable to contribute a fix, but if I could, it would probably be to simply only create the GACTV object when needed, which is [exactly once here](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/3.1.2.Final/devtools/gradle/gradle-application-plugin/src/main/java/io/quarkus/gradle/tasks/QuarkusBuildTask.java#L146), instead of storing as a field of this object.


A bit of a rant: lazy configuration turns out to be really useful in Gradle, but I really wish they'd write something up in their Javadoc so we could use it properly. Gradle improves so fast that sometimes it's hard to know what's old and what's new. The [table on their lazy configuration page](https://docs.gradle.org/8.1.1/userguide/task_configuration_avoidance.html#sec:old_vs_new_configuration_api_overview) is probably a better way to learn about this stuff compared to peeking at the source, but I'm a bit insane and dig into source all the time... I just wish the Gradle Javadoc was better. End rant.

### Expected behavior

Quarkus build succeeds :wink: even when I eagerly configure tasks to do some extra checks.

### Actual behavior

The Quarkus build fails. Here's example output from the reproducer:


### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/jskillin-idt/quarkusio-quarkus-issues-34352

Steps to reproduce:
1. Clone the above repo.
2. Run ./gradlew build

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux jskillin-ubuntu-dev 6.2.0-23-generic #23-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Wed May 17 16:55:20 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.7" 2023-04-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 17.0.7+7-Ubuntu-0ubuntu123.04) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.7+7-Ubuntu-0ubuntu123.04, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.1.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 8.1.1

### Additional information

_No response_
